page.title: 15TRANSPORT.RAILWAYS
page.content: {FREIGHT TRAINS {Clay trains (i)}Waggons to Fowey for shipment.484 waggons in use,small ones take 13tons,large 57tons.34 small or 7 large form a train.{(ii)}Tankers to Kent & Scotland with slurry for paper making.30 tankers in use,taking 46 tons.40 drivers,12 shunters,20 guards employed & 20 for maintenance. Motive power:Class 37 locos favoured,using a gallon of fuel every 2 miles.{Parcels 5 trains each way daily,mixed traffic (Parcels & passengers).One complete parcel train each way daily _ 10 vans to Bristol before splitting up.One mail train each way daily.PO business, papers,flowers & vegetables the main cargo.Motive power:Class 45 & 47 locos favoured.{Track.}Twin tracked main line checked daily throughout by 10 men.100 men used in repair work.Speed limit 70 mph in Cornwall.
